data.text:
Current Local Time

Hill Air Force Base, Utah is officially in the Mountain Time Zone

The Current Time in

Hill Air Force Base, Utah is:

Wednesday

8/14/2024

5:30 AM

MDT

Hill Air Force Base, Utah

is in the

Mountain Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Mountain Standard Time - is abbreviated as MST

Mountain Daylight Time - is abbreviated as MDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Hill Air Force Base, Utah is GMT/UTC - 7h during Standard Time

Hill Air Force Base, Utah is GMT/UTC - 6h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Hill Air Force Base, Utah starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
